blogPost.excerpt: Miventure is an investment platform that lets you become a ground-floor investor in early-stage startups with as little as $25. The best part about the startups on Miventure is that many are striving to become the next Uber of their industry.
blogPost.body: Miventure is an investment platform that lets you become a ground-floor investor in early-stage startups with as little as $25. The best part about the startups on Miventure is that many are striving to become the next Uber of their industry.
blogPost.title: Miventure - Robinhood for startup investing
blogPost.author: Luiggi Pera

localize.description: Miventureは、わずか25ドルでアーリーステージのスタートアップ企業への投資を可能にする投資プラットフォームです。Miventureに登録されているスタートアップの最大の特徴は、その多くが業界の次のUberになることを目指していることです。
localize.tagline: スタートアップ投資のためのRobinhood

localize.description: Miventure是一个投资平台，让你只需花25美元就能成为早期创业公司的底层投资者。Miventure上的初创企业最好的部分是，许多企业正在努力成为其行业的下一个Uber。
Miventure是一個投資平臺，讓你只需花25美元就能成爲早期創業公司的底層投資者。Miventure上的初創企業最好的部分是，許多企業正在努力成爲其行業的下一個Uber。
